content.question:
The Decline of Birth Rates in England and Wales, France, Germany, and Sweden, 1840-1913

The major reason for the pattern shown in the graph above is

choices.label: parents' decision to have smaller families
a declining standard of prenatal care for pregnant women
a decrease in the marriage rate of women
increased use of birth control pills

content.answer: parents' decision to have smaller families

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
